title: 200 Ping
body: For the past couple weeks I've been getting an average of around 200 ping. Sometimes it will go down to the 50's (What it used to be) this is the only game I've been getting higher than normal ping.

replies.body: Your network might have hit a rough spot on its way to our servers which caused that little hiccup. If that was the only game affected you might be okay, but if you start seeing that happen more often make sure that you run through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to clean up that connection.

I have the same issue. My ping use to be 44 most of the time and now it hangs around 200 pings for the passed two weeks as well. I don't know what ocurred to make this happen but i hope something gets changed to fix whatever they might have done D:
